title: FS: T205 Olmstead Polar Bear Back SGC 50 PRICE LOWERED
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Olmstead Polar Bear Back SGC 50 PRICE LOWERED
posts.post_content:
This one would have been a 60 if not for the light staining on the back. Hate to give it up but I need the funds for another purchase. $65 with shipping & DC on me. Prefer Paypal (gift if poss.) but will accept MO or check if necessary.
Thanks

bump for price reduction
Although I appreciate the offers I have been getting, please don't offer any less than $55. It's what I paid and I wouldn't take any less, I'd rather just put it back in the collection.
Thanks!
